text:
Fate works in the 
light or dark, for
princesses or fools.

In my Shrine you have
to play by my rules!

text:
At last, you got a 
compass! You can use it
to warp to the shrine

entrance anywhere on 
the world map. Find it
on the status screen.

args.text: Should be possible to use enemy position to set collectable position
Compass already collected
Debug flag set to open doors on touch

In Gibdo form we need a variable for random movement and for defense (because it can be defeated.

In Jack form we need a variable to know if we're moving down and if we're moving right.

Knowing this we can double up and reuse variables because each state needs to be aware of exclusive information.
Debug flag set to open doors on touch

Knowing this we can double up and reuse variables because each state needs to be aware of exclusive information.

text:
Zelda, I am your
destiny! I weave the
course of your quest,

I measure and I cut
what you lose. I deem
what is fate, and what

is best, and I leave you
no power to choose!

Malmord defeated
Malmord defeated
Malmord has given his speech

text:
So, you found 
Malmord's home at last!
Now touch your wand to

the stone on the right.
For I am Malmord, who
controls future and

past, and I will make us
even in magic and might!

Bravo! Once again, you
have proven you are
worthy of your quest.

Hurry, now - waters
of healing and renewal
await you.

Remember to look for
the great Sea Island
to the south.
